description:
Kristine is the cute girl next door, and has an innocent look to her. My plan is to destroy the girl next door and turn her into the pain slut that I know she is. She is bound standing and the torment starts immediately with pegs applied all over her body and then sadistically removed with a dragon tail.
She is then suspended from her ankles and endures more punishment, orgasm denial, and then her wrists are added to the suspension pulling her body into a brutal arch.
Next we have her standing spread eagle and the torment increases greatly, pushing her body further than ever before. A crotch rope is applied and she suffers through another orgasm.
The final position uses her body against her to keep her tightly bound. Her entire body has been used, and now her soles will suffer like the rest of her. Not to let the rest of her body rest, this becomes a full out assault on her flesh.
title: How Far Will She Go?
